page.title: 09CLUBS IN THE WALES AREA.
page.content: In{Wales}lots of people belong to clubs or groups.Keep-fit is popular for Mums. Many Dads go to football clubs but they usually travel out of this area to play. Many children go to Brownies,Cubs, Scouts and Guides. There is a weekly church club called "Methodist Friday club", a "Garden Holders club" and the "Forge Ladies Circle Club". There is a Monday youth club for children aged 11-16 years. In{Killamarsh}there is a leisure centre where they hold badminton, squash,Keep-fit,Dancing and majorette classes.At{Beighton}there is a dance centre. They teach all sorts of dancing there, such as Ballroom,Modern and disco dancing.Also at Beighton there is a Health club which has a gymnasium for men and women.
